General.Name: Bentoel International Investama
General.Description: PT Bentoel Internasional Investama Tbk manufactures and distributes cigarettes in Indonesia. It offers a range of hand-made kretek, machine-made kretek, and machine-made white cigarettes under the Dunhill Filter, Dunhill Mild, Lucky Strike, Dunhill International, Bentoel Biru, Tali Jagat, Bintang Buana, Sejati, Neo Mild, and Uno Mild brand names. The company was formerly known as PT Transindo Multi Prima Tbk and changed its name to PT Bentoel Internasional Investama Tbk in August 2000. The company was founded in 1930 and is headquartered in South Jakarta, Indonesia. PT Bentoel Internasional Investama Tbk is a subsidiary of British American Tobacco (2009 PCA) Ltd.
General.Address: Capital Place Office Tower, Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia, 12710
